sense.gloss: switch (long, slender shoot of a tree)
being surrounded by enemies on all sides, being betrayed (forsaken) by everybody
Okinawan biscuit (similar to shortbread, made with lard), Okinawan cookie
polished gyaru, girl or young woman adhering to a toned down version of the gyaru fashion trend
neat and tidy woman who is (unexpectedly) promiscuous

sdata.j: これじゃあまるで↑四面楚歌↑↓しめんそか↓だ。
sdata.e: I see that I am surrounded by hostile faces.

sdata.j: あんな↑四面楚歌↑↓しめんそか↓の↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓で、↑彼↑↓かれ↓よく↑仕事↑↓しごと↓してられるよな。
sdata.e: He's completely shunned. I'm surprised he's still working here.

sdata.j: これじゃあまるで↑四面楚歌↑↓しめんそか↓だ。
sdata.e: I see that I'm surrounded by hostile faces.
